name: 维尔纳·海森堡
bio_short: 德国理论物理学家，量子力学的先驱之一。他因创立“矩阵力学”（`heisenberg_matrix_mechanics_1925`）和发现“测不准原理”（`heisenberg_uncertainty_1927`）而获得了1932年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: A German theoretical physicist and one of the key pioneers of quantum mechanics. He was awarded the 1932 Nobel Prize in Physics for the creation of 'matrix mechanics' (`heisenberg_matrix_mechanics_1925`) and his discovery of the 'Uncertainty Principle' (`heisenberg_uncertainty_1927`).
